byline.contributor: Vindu Goel reported from San Francisco and Mike Isaac from New York. Nick Bilton contributed reporting from Los Angeles.
byline.original: By VINDU GOEL and MIKE ISAAC

abstract: Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey returns as company's interim chief, replacing Dick Costolo; Dorsey's arrival after two-year absence, sporting an uncharacteristic 'mountain man' beard, causes stir among employees who fear volatile leader's interim title will become permanent.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Dorsey is a figure of legend to newer Twitter employees, and remembered with varying degrees of fondness and fear by those who worked with him during his earlier stints there.

headline.main: Jack Dorsey Returns to Twitter as Chief, to Shrugs and Quips
headline.print_headline: A Boss Returns to Twitter, to Shrugs and Quips

snippet: Mr. Dorsey is a figure of legend to newer Twitter employees, and remembered with varying degrees of fondness and fear by those who worked with him during his earlier stints there.
